snippet.textDisplay: She can fool people some of a time but she cannot fool all people all the time.
snippet.textOriginal: She can fool people some of a time but she cannot fool all people all the time.

snippet.textDisplay: They have PROOF that she was the one being violent, PROOF that she got makeup done to make it look like bruises, PROOF that JD was the ONLY one who had physical abuse, and PROOF that JD is completely calm while she’s trying to get a rise out of him because she wants to fight and he doesn’t, and PROOF that she was actively trying to ruin his career because she’s a psychotic person who can’t stand being dumped by a man!!! How is this still a question on who’s the abuser?! How has this case not been solved? How is her career thriving while his is ending? ALL of his ex’s came forward to tell everyone that JD was NEVER abusive to them and always kind! HOW with ALL of this proof, is she still the victim?! How has she not LOST the case yet?! I’m completely baffled! This is the most ridiculous thing I’ve ever heard and seen! She is nothing but a complete and total psychopath who gets off on ruining the lives of anyone who dare try to get her out of their lives! She not only gets off on it, but absolutely loves watching her lies destroy innocent people! She has no regard for anyone’s life but her own! If it were possible for her to get away with, she would have killed him and even then with the way this BS case is going she might have gotten away with that too!!! She’s absolutely loving this! I can’t believe that someone can be soooo damn twisted, disgusting, psychotic towards someone who gave them nothing but love! She deserves to have the exact same done to her! She deserves to lose everything and more! Someone needs to beat her a$$! She is an absolute disgusting, waste of flesh, oxygen, and space who needs to be taken down! She cannot just do this to a beloved, innocent, kind man! Johnny’s only fault was marrying this POS! She is a truly horrifying psychopath who now knows she can get away with something this disturbing so this makes her even more dangerous! FUTURE VICTIMS BEWARE because there are absolutely going to be more victims! Please for the love of god someone take her down and give her a taste of her own psychotic medicine!!! Take her down before she can do this to anyone else! She has been proven to be a big fat liar many times! She says herself how she got the bruises painted on her face to screw him over! She’s disgustingly toxic and manipulates him into thinking he’s at fault too! She MADE herself seem irresistible to him, made him think she was the “perfect woman”, LIED her way into the relationship, manipulated him into the relationship, she NEVER loved him, she’s incapable of loving anyone but herself. She pretended to love him to get him to marry her! I know women like her, I have seen exactly this situation many times, psychotic women who try to ruin a mans life when the man gets tired of them and tries to leave the relationship and these psychotic women WILL NOT just LET them leave the relationship OH NO how dare they try to leave them, they will PAY for it, I’ve seen them literally hit themselves in the face and then call the cops and blame the man, getting him arrested and then try to turn around and get him back by manipulating him into thinking it was his fault too! She tried to make herself seem innocent and sweet during interviews about the “abuse” she’s SO despicable, dangerous, disgusting, a lying tw@$, everything about her SCREAMS abusive liar, fake, psychotic, who needs to be heavily medicated and locked in a padded cell! PLUS she has a domestic violence record!!!! JD does NOT! Wtf is wrong with people?! #freejohnnydepp

snippet.textDisplay:
Something that occurred to me as I’ve watched all of this unfold was the jewelry JD wears, specifically his rings; if he physically assaulted her to the extent that she claims, wouldn’t there be some evidence of that on his rings in one form or another? Blood in particular, as skin cells or touch/trace DNA does not prove anything. Even if he had them cleaned thoroughly, especially multiple times, bleach is very corrosive and damaging to silver & particularly gold, so there would likely be evidence of that too. Cleaned or not cleaned, I would imagine if he truly assaulted her as violently & frequently as she claims, there would likely still be trace blood evidence in the nooks and crannies of those rings.

I dunno, food for thought I suppose. She provided elaborate, detailed accounts of his ‘violence’. If I had his resources, I’d have hired a forensic team to check for her blood everywhere & anywhere she alleged where all of this had taken place.

It’s such a shame that the most obvious of details do not appear to be enough to instill serious doubt in both the courts of law & ‘public opinion’. Aside from the fact that abusive people always have some history of it in some form or another, the behavior of AH’s parents alone speaks volumes. Although at some point there were text messages that came to light about AH texting her mother about JD being violent towards her & not wanting to tell her father (before or after their divorce, I can’t remember). You’d think that the parents of an alleged victim in fear for their life due to a man’s ‘never ending violence’ would be infuriated, upset, confrontational, etc. and not pleading with him to forgive her because it was the lawyers’ idea to create such allegations in order to avoid eviction from his home. The same ‘victim’ who is so afraid of her husband bringing different men into his penthouse at late hours while he is out of town. Even if the recorded conversations are out of context, there are still so many other telling details like AH’s history of physical assault with her ex wife on the record, including allegedly against her own sister (the same grown up ‘baby sister’ she unnecessarily went on that tangent about so desperately & vehemently needing to protect from JD during the UK libel trial while avoiding a direct question), testimony from her former assistant, the ordeal with the $7 million dollar (lack of) donation, the video(s) AH released where she clearly is attempting to instigate a nasty fight caught on tape, and so on.

I am frustrated just by following this case, so I can’t begin to fathom how JD feels. The man is no saint, and I do not doubt for a moment that he has made some poor decisions in the heat of the moment fighting with AH, but not for a moment do these allegations scream chronically, violently abusive husband...

Something that occurred to me as I’ve watched all of this unfold was the jewelry JD wears, specifically his rings; if he physically assaulted her to the extent that she claims, wouldn’t there be some evidence of that on his rings in one form or another? Blood in particular, as skin cells or touch/trace DNA does not prove anything. Even if he had them cleaned thoroughly, especially multiple times, bleach is very corrosive and damaging to silver & particularly gold, so there would likely be evidence of that too. Cleaned or not cleaned, I would imagine if he truly assaulted her as violently & frequently as she claims, there would likely still be trace blood evidence in the nooks and crannies of those rings. 

I dunno, food for thought I suppose. She provided elaborate, detailed accounts of his ‘violence’. If I had his resources, I’d have hired a forensic team to check for her blood everywhere & anywhere she alleged where all of this had taken place. 

It’s such a shame that the most obvious of details do not appear to be enough to instill serious doubt in both the courts of law & ‘public opinion’. Aside from the fact that abusive people always have some history of it in some form or another, the behavior of AH’s parents alone speaks volumes. Although at some point there were text messages that came to light about AH texting her mother about JD being violent towards her & not wanting to tell her father (before or after their divorce, I can’t remember). You’d think that the parents of an alleged victim in fear for their life due to a man’s ‘never ending violence’ would be infuriated, upset, confrontational, etc. and *not* pleading with him to forgive _her_ because it was the lawyers’ idea to create such allegations in order to avoid eviction from his home. The same ‘victim’ who is *so* afraid of her husband bringing different men into his penthouse at late hours while he is out of town. Even *if* the recorded conversations are out of context, there are still so many other telling details like AH’s history of physical assault with her ex wife on the record, including allegedly against her own sister (the same grown up ‘baby sister’ she unnecessarily went on that tangent about so desperately & vehemently needing to protect from JD during the UK libel trial while avoiding a direct question), testimony from her former assistant, the ordeal with the $7 million dollar (lack of) donation, the video(s) AH released where she clearly is attempting to instigate a nasty fight caught on tape, and so on. 

I am frustrated just by following this case, so I can’t begin to fathom how JD feels. The man is no saint, and I do not doubt for a moment that he has made some poor decisions in the heat of the moment fighting with AH, but not for a moment do these allegations scream chronically, violently abusive husband...
